DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this clinical registry is to prospectively collect and compare preoperative and postoperative patient-reported data using validated shoulder-specific and health-related quality of life (QoL) instruments during real-world use of the Rotation Medical bioinductive implant to treat rotator cuff tears.
DOC.brief_title: Rotation Medical Bioinductive Implant Database Registry
DOC.criteria: 1. At least 21 years of age. 2. Able and willing to provide voluntary consent to Registry participation. 3. Able to read, speak, and understand the English language. 1. Hypersensitive to bovinederived materials.
